page.title: 07ADULT LEISURE, GILLINGHAM
page.content: 1C went around Gillingham and asked 122 adults what they liked doing in their spare time. Forty one enjoyed{ {sport}for exercise and relaxation. Twenty three liked{gardening}because they enjoyed seeing the flowers and vegetables grow and it kept the garden tidy. Twenty three enjoyed doing {housework}and even found it relaxing. Eight liked{working}for other people so that they could earn money and become famous. Nine liked{reading}for relaxation and information. Five liked {driving}because they enjoy visiting places. Three think that{television} is entertaining and that you can learn from it. Six like{going out}to meet friends, three enjoy{breeding animals and one person takes pleasure in {photography.
